title: [Large-Scale] Practical Application of Ordinary Differential Equations (ODE) Through Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Calculus and Linear Algebra Knowledge
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining MOOC platforms with offline classes for current practitioners, applying digital device provision and project-based assessment methods.

learning_goals: Learners can apply analytical/numerical solutions for first- and second-order linear differential equations to practical tasks.
Learners can solve 80% or more of ODE-related project problems using MOOC platform resources.
Learners can apply ODE modeling techniques to real engineering problems through team-based PBL activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
